body: `split_with_sizes` is not in public API. In python, there is a custom `def split` that dispatches to either c++ function depending on the input args. Yes, python will continue to have split that takes an `int[]`.
body_html: split_with_sizes is not in public API. In python, there is a custom def split that dispatches to either c++ function depending on the input args. Yes, python will continue to have split that takes an int[].
